title: Whale Song Whales and Dolphins of the Pacific
brief_description: Whalesong is a tribute to the majesty and grace of singing, dancing, ancient mammals that have graced our planet for 50 million years … and yet are still endangered by senseless slaughter and ocean pollution. “Whalesong” will inspire awe, love and empathy for the whales and dolphins by allowing you to feel a part of their world. Lloyd Bridges is our escort and guide to the people that live in the sea.
